title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: Both businesses continued to develop through takeovers and acquisitions,  and in 1960, they merged to form Macfarlan Smith Ltd.The company was taken over by the Glaxo group in 1963. It still employs over two hundred workers at its plant in Wheatfield Road, in the city's Gorgie district.
